new_feature_requests.summary: Add a small batch of discipline skills (no more than 5 at a time) to the backend skill matrix in main.mo, continuing from where the previous batch left off. Each skill should include all required fields (id, name, description, category, stat requirements, level requirement, unlock status defaults).
Update the frontend SkillsPage.tsx to display the newly added batch of skills, grouped by category and showing unlock status and requirements consistently with existing skill entries.

projectName: Add next small batch of skills to the skill matrix
